metadata.description: Additional unstructured metadata to include with the template deployment.

contentVersion.description: A 4 number format for the version number of this template file. For example, 1.0.0.0

resources.description: Collection of resources to be deployed

apiVersion.description: API Version of the resource type, optional when apiProfile is used on the template

dependsOn.description: Collection of resources this resource depends on

defaultValue.description: Default value to be used if one is not provided

metadata.description: Metadata for the parameter, can be any valid JSON object
